name: Graveskelet
description:
In a jungle full of skeletons, you will equip your gun and start hunting them.

When you're low on health or ammo, you'll wander around and try to find them.

Graveskelet basically has the following features:
-Classic Looter Shooter experience.
-A fantastic forest ambience.
-Seeing your score on the leaderboard.
-Ambient sounds to match the theme.

If you are looking for a challenging shooter experience, Graveskelet is for you.

Grab your weapon and have fun with medieval skeletons.
